service1.title: Planning and Installation of Irrigation Systems
service1.desc: We plan and install professional automated irrigation systems using industry-leading components from Hunter, Rain Bird, and Gardena. Our systems feature water-saving technology and zone-based control, installed with precision to protect your existing lawn.
service1.alt: Hunter and Rain Bird irrigation system installation Vienna und Umgebung

service2.title: Maintenance and Repair of Systems
service2.desc: We ensure your system runs smoothly all year round, providing expert service for Hunter, Rain Bird, and Gardena equipment. From spring start-up to leak repairs and controller updates, we handle it all â€“ even if we didn't install the original system.
service2.alt: Gardena and Hunter irrigation repair and maintenance

service3.title: General Garden Maintenance
service3.desc: A beautiful garden needs regular care. We offer lawn mowing, edge trimming, weed removal, pruning of shrubs and hedges, and disposal of green waste. On request, we can also take care of one-time or seasonal garden work.
service3.alt: Professional garden maintenance and lawn care

service4.title: Fencing, Railings & Terrace Construction
service4.desc: We build the solid structure of your garden. Our service includes the professional installation and repair of fences and railings made of various materials, as well as expert terrace construction. From sturdy boundary fencing to creating a cozy outdoor living space â€“ we ensure durability, safety, and a modern aesthetic for your home.

about.title: About us
about.intro: We specialize in garden rescue and redesign: bringing overgrown and neglected gardens back into shape and creating the foundation for a beautiful outdoor space. In addition, we design and install modern irrigation systems for sustainable care.

inhouseTech.title: Our Craftsmanship & Expertise
inhouseTech.desc: We offer a complete solution for your outdoor space. From heavy-duty terrain leveling and soil preparation to the professional construction of fences, terraces, and the installation of smart irrigation systems from Hunter and Rain Bird. We handle precise pruning, expert weed removal, and soil conditioning for new lawns or planting. Using modern machinery and technical expertise, we create the lasting structure that transforms your garden into a premium living space.

audience.title: Who are our services for?

Especially attractive for customers in 1130 Vienna â€“ Hietzing: no travel surcharge.
